𓏶 mezquino < מסכןא meskēnā < 𒈦𒆕𒂗 muškēnum (meso,mid,mean-man) 𓎛 𓈖 𓋴 𓄣 𓏤

𒈦 SA₉ semi 1/2 MAŠ meso "half; middle, center"

𓏶 + mark in Byblos Syllabary and Byblian Alphabet

المتوسط mutawasid middle:waist

at least two readings
1. 𓏶 'M' medi 𒈦 MASH meso maš mas++ 𓏶𓏶 math Matte mid Mast 𓏶 𓃒 𐎎𐎏 meat mange Mahl
2. 𓏶 pro + par 𓅓𓐝 imperator bun 𓃹𓃺 𒈦 par ++ Q.E.D.
3. 𓏶 comar center κέντρο 中 zhōng 中心 xin খানা khana = essen(z) quam comar com ++ 𓃹𓃺 ζῆν Sein 𒈦 SA₉

Religion = Neuere AusLegung

𓅓 ⋍ 𓏶 imPer SUPERROOT for PIE prepositons
1) 𓅓 ⋍ 𓏶 im, in, mit, mitte, 𓅓𓏶𓏶 ⇔ 𓏇𓏏𓏏𓏛 wie, with
2) 𓅓 ⋍ 𓏶 PER,PRO,PARA,PRE,FORE,FOR,für,ver,vor
2) 𓅓 ⋍ 𓏶 peri,upper,over,über,hyper,super, …
3) 𓃹 ⋍ 𓏶 sen,cen,中,zhōng,con,sym,𓊃,essen,seen,𓏖𓏖𓏗𓏗𓂺
